projects.title: Cryptainer Device
projects.blurb: Physical secure storage container for Bitcoin and sensitive assets, protected by animated Glyph Key Sprites. Combines unique firmware, encryption, and gamified sentinel design.

projects.title: ZZXBBC
projects.blurb: The ZZX Broadband Broadcast Console: a modular 4K-capable encrypted conferencing device. Integrates multiple camera modules, USB-A/C expansion, HDMI output, and secure comms firmware.

projects.title: Costanza Wallet
projects.blurb: Hardware Bitcoin wallet concept built for maximal cold-storage security, using SHA3-256, lowercase Base32 encoding, and modular key recovery safeguards.

projects.title: VLC Box
projects.blurb: Standalone open-source media player appliance built on Raspberry Pi. Provides full VLC Media Player features, visualizers, playlist management, and OBS streaming integration.

projects.title: Bit-Tick Hardware Suite
projects.blurb: Collection of dedicated Bitcoin ticker devices (M5, Wio, Raspberry Pi) running custom firmware. Displays real-time global weighted BTC price with sub-denominations and LN stats.
